oai_dc:dc.dc:title: "Views of Greater Memphis, Tenn." Postcard Collection
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Exterior Side One: "Views of Greater Memphis, Tenn. -- The Heart of the South -- Gateway to West -- 'Down in Dixie' -- Auditorium"; Handwritten: "Miss Laura McCullough -- 113 North Walnut -- Springfield, Ill."; Exterior Side Two: "The Mississippi River, View from the Arkansas Side, showing Skyscrapers and Business District also Levee at Memphis, Tenn."

Interior: "Memphis" introductory text; "Baptist Hospital and Surgeons Building" image; "Elks Club and Hotel Building" image; "Doughboy Monument, Overton Park" image; "Main at Madison, Looking North" image; "Cossitt Library and Custom House" image; "The Levee From The Bluff" image; "Court Square" image; "Hotel Claridge" image; "Memphis and Harrihan [sic] Bridges, Spanning Mississippi River" image; "Columbian Mutual Tower, Main & North Court" image; "Hotel Peabody" image; "Southwestern, the College of the Mississippi Valley" image; "Grand Central Station" image; "Shelby County Court House" image; "Methodist Hospital" image; "Municipal Swimming Pool" image;
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: buildings; hospitals; streets; parks; bridges; Southwestern at Memphis; Cossitt Library; hotels;
